pdescription: It Ends With Us has the bones of a powerful story but reads like a low budget Hallmark movie pushed forward by ridiculous plot revelations.
Lily and her ex-husband, Ryle, have just settled into a civil coparenting rhythm when she suddenly bumps into her first love, Atlas, again.
A troubled young mother yearns for a shot at redemption in this heartbreaking yet hopeful story from bestselling author Colleen Hoover.
All your perfects is a profound novel about a damaged couple whose potential future hinges on promises made in the past.
Sometimes discovering the truth can leave you more hopeless than believing the lies. That's what Sky Davis realizes after she meets Dean Holder.
A chance encounter in the dark leads eighteen-year-old Daniel and the girl who stumbles across him to profess their love for each other.
